item.title: NEP API
item.description: This tutorial explains how to communicate nodes using the patterns supported in NEP Client-Server In the Client-Server pattern a node (Client) sends a request for some data to other node (Server) and then waits for the response to this request. An example of how to create a simple client-server application is shown bellow: Creates a client in Python The next Python script shown a simple example of a client node
